entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Aspire dotnet-watch support: Properly handle launch profile specified in DCP #43946

Closed

  • `dotnet add package` does not report vulnerablities #43935
  • dotnet nuget package list -- error: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path') #43936
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Windows.Forms, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' in .Net9-rc1 #43593

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • WebSDK: OneDeploy - use 'PLACEHOLDER' value for variable that represent a secret in Unit Tests #43943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't fire azdo PR pipelines for simple documentation changes #43940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43914
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43913
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the table for 9.0.2xx and 10.0.1xx #43918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove vstest 0001-Auto-property-suggestion.patch #43939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43933
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid serializing/deserializing manifest for hash #43710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet-format: Support hidden severity for analyzers and code fixes #43929
    untriaged, Area-Format
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for Aspire #43884
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2554641 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make a parallel loop for define static web assets #43743
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
